tha-ap101:0.3_0: He should responsible as senior monks.
tha-ap101:1.4_0: about all the monasteries or their heart.
tha-ap101:2.1_0: but I don’t have a refuge,
tha-ap101:2.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
tha-ap101:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap101:4.2_0: Then the kings have been clearly seen and heard.
tha-ap101:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap101:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
tha-ap101:7.1_0: The ninth ruler of the senior monks who rule.
